column4: Hello i have severe problems with pc freezing after applaying updates tonight. Hardware is Ion2 *Nvidia , Intel etc ..
anyone else have problems after updating ubuntu 10.10 ??
perhaps different hardware, 64 bit and Nvidia ??
ya, 64-bit and nvidia here.. everything works fine here
damn weird, my pc just freezes after 1 or 2 minutes
i am on a USB stick atm, live
well i havent restarted since todays new kernel
i did that, thats when problems began
care to try a restart after latest kernel and headers update ???
try escape at bootup and boot the old kernel
i am tired now, atheros wireless dont work well with ubuntu, i had to install nvidia 64 bit drivers manually ... and then after auto upgrade the damn system hangs ..
how do i escape at boot then,
when the computer starts, press the escape or shift button, i dont remember
i try that, thanks, hope it saved the old kernel so i can downgrade
